What do you know about the deal that John 3 Connolly has with your father? 4 A. I only know they spoke on the telephone 5 once. I don't know anything else. 6 Q. When was that? 7 A. This was a while ago, a year or two -- or a 8 year ago. I honestly don't know. 9 Q. Did John Connolly, the Vanity Fair 10 reporter, offer any money to your father? 11 A. I don't know. 12 Q. Zero. 19 Q. What about your family members? What 20 reporters have they spoken to? 21 A. The whole Palm Beach County, obviously, as 22 you can see in that newspaper. 23 Q. Tell me -- let's go through each one that 24 you remember.
